member.summary: Specifies the six Slides per page.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.PresentationToPdfConverter.PublishOptions
member.summary: Specifies the publishing options of the instance.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.PresentationToPdfConverter.PublishOptions.Slides
member.summary: Allows converting all the slides in a Presentation to PDF document. This is the default option.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.PresentationToPdfConverter.PublishOptions.Handouts
member.summary: Allows the PDF pages in the converted PDF document to hold more than one slides as specified by the enumerator

member.name: F:Syncfusion.PresentationToPdfConverter.PublishOptions.NotesPages
member.summary: Allows to convert the notes in the slides to PDF document.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.PresentationToPdfConverter.PresentationToPdfConverterSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Intialize the new instance of presentation to pdfConverter settings.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.PresentationToPdfConverter.PresentationToPdfConverterSettings.SlidesPerPage
member.summary: Gets or Sets the slides per page

member.name: P:Syncfusion.PresentationToPdfConverter.PresentationToPdfConverterSettings.ShowHiddenSlides
member.summary: Indicates whether to export hidden slides or not.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.PresentationToPdfConverter.PresentationToPdfConverterSettings.PublishOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets the available publishing options to export the Presentation to PDF document.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.PresentationToPdfConverter.PresentationToPdfConverterSettings.ImageQuality
member.summary: Gets or sets the quality. The value indicates in percentage, max value represents best quality and min value represents best compression.
member.remarks: The value indicates in percentage, max value represents best quality and min value represents best compression

member.name: P:Syncfusion.PresentationToPdfConverter.PresentationToPdfConverterSettings.ImageResolution
member.summary: Sets the image resolution to the image, which are embedded in the PowerPoint presentation.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.PresentationToPdfConverter.PresentationToPdfConverterSettings.PdfConformanceLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets the PDF document's Conformance-level.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.PresentationToPdfConverter.PresentationToPdfConverterSettings.OptimizeIdenticalImages
member.summary: Gets or Sets a value indicating whether to optimize the memory usage for the identical (duplicate) images in PPTX to PDF conversion and converted PDF document.
